alert.note: Alert for Houston; Peach; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Twiggs, northeastern Peach and northern Houston Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lakewood, or 7 miles east of Fort Valley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Robins AFB, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Houston Lake, Lakewood, Powerville, Bonaire, Miami Valley and Kathleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
